item.text: From the blue, purple, and scarlet yarn they made woven garments for serving in the sanctuary; they made holy garments that were for Aaron, just as the Lord had commanded Moses.
He made the ephod of gold, blue, purple, scarlet yarn, and fine twisted linen.

They <st data-num="07554" class="">hammered</st> the <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">into</st> <st data-num="06341" class="">thin sheets</st> and <st data-num="07112" class="">cut</st> it into <st data-num="06616" class="">narrow strips</st> to <st data-num="06213" class="">weave</st><n id="1" /> them <st data-num="08432" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="08504" class="">blue</st>, <st data-num="0713" class="">purple</st>, and <st data-num="08438 08144" class="">scarlet yarn</st>, and <st data-num="08432" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="08336" class="">fine linen</st>, the <st data-num="04639" class="">work</st> of an <st data-num="02803" class="">artistic designer</st>.

They <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="03802" class="">shoulder pieces</st> for it, <st data-num="02266" class="">attached</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> of its <st data-num="07118" class="">corners</st>, so it could be <st data-num="02266" class="">joined together</st>.
The artistically woven waistband of the ephod that was on it was like it, of one piece with it, of gold, blue, purple, and scarlet yarn and fine twisted linen, just as the Lord had commanded Moses.
They set the onyx stones in gold filigree settings, engraved as with the engravings of a seal with the names of the sons of Israel.
He put them on the shoulder pieces of the ephod as stones of memorial for the Israelites, just as the Lord had commanded Moses.
He made the breastpiece, the work of an artistic designer, in the same fashion as the ephod, of gold, blue, purple, and scarlet yarn, and fine twisted linen.

It <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> <st data-num="07251" class="">square</st>—they <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> the <st data-num="02833" class="">breastpiece</st> <st data-num="03717" class="">doubled</st>, <st data-num="02239" class="">nine inches</st> <st data-num="0753" class="">long</st> and <st data-num="02239" class="">nine inches</st> <st data-num="07341" class="">wide</st> when <st data-num="03717" class="">doubled</st>.

They <st data-num="04390" class="">set</st> on it<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="02905" class="">rows</st> of <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st>: a <st data-num="02905" class="">row</st> with a <st data-num="0124" class="">ruby</st>, a <st data-num="06357" class="">topaz</st>, and a <st data-num="01304" class="">beryl</st>—the <st data-num="0259" class="">first</st> <st data-num="02905" class="">row</st>;

and the <st data-num="08145" class="">second</st> <st data-num="02905" class="">row</st>, a <st data-num="05306" class="">turquoise</st>, a <st data-num="05601" class="">sapphire</st>, and an <st data-num="03095" class="">emerald</st>;

and the <st data-num="07992" class="">third</st> <st data-num="02905" class="">row</st>, a <st data-num="03958" class="">jacinth</st>, an <st data-num="07618" class="">agate</st>, and an <st data-num="0306" class="">amethyst</st>;

and the <st data-num="07243" class="">fourth</st> <st data-num="02905" class="">row</st>, a <st data-num="08658" class="">chrysolite</st>, an <st data-num="07718" class="">onyx</st>, and a <st data-num="03471" class="">jasper</st>. They were <st data-num="04142" class="">enclosed</st> in <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="04865" class="">filigree</st> <st data-num="04396" class="">settings</st>.
The stones were for the names of the sons of Israel, twelve, corresponding to the number of their names. Each name corresponding to one of the twelve tribes was like the engravings of a seal.
They made for the breastpiece braided chains like cords of pure gold,

and they <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="04865" class="">filigree settings</st> and <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st>, and they <st data-num="05414" class="">attached</st> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the upper<n id="1" /> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07098" class="">ends</st> of the <st data-num="02833" class="">breastpiece</st>.

They <st data-num="05414" class="">attached</st> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="05688" class="">chains</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="07098" class="">ends</st> of the <st data-num="02833" class="">breastpiece</st>;

the other<n id="1" /> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07098" class="">ends</st> of the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="05688" class="">chains</st> they <st data-num="05414" class="">attached</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="04865" class="">settings</st>, and they <st data-num="05414" class="">attached</st> them <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03802" class="">shoulder pieces</st> of the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="04136" class="">front</st> of <st data-num="06440" class="">it</st>.

They <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> of <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> and <st data-num="07760" class="">put</st> them <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the other<n id="1" /> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07098" class="">ends</st> of the <st data-num="02833" class="">breastpiece</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> its <st data-num="08193" class="">edge</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> is <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">inner</st> <st data-num="05676" class="">side</st> of the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st>.<n id="2" />

They <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> more<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">attached</st> them <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04295" class="">bottom</st> of the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="03802" class="">shoulder pieces</st> <st data-num="04136 06440" class="">on the front</st> of the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st>, <st data-num="05980" class="">close</st> to the <st data-num="04225" class="">juncture</st> <st data-num="04605" class="">above</st> the <st data-num="02805" class="">waistband</st> of the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st>.

They tied the breastpiece by its rings to the rings of the ephod by blue cord, so that it was above the waistband of the ephod, so that the breastpiece would not be loose from the ephod, just as the Lord had commanded Moses.
He made the robe of the ephod completely blue, the work of a weaver.

There was an <st data-num="06310" class="">opening</st> in the <st data-num="08432" class="">center</st> of the <st data-num="04598" class="">robe</st>, like the <st data-num="06310" class="">opening</st> of a <st data-num="08473" class="">collar</st>,<n id="1" /> with an <st data-num="08193" class="">edge</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">all around</st> the <st data-num="06310" class="">opening</st> so that it could <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="07167" class="">torn</st>.

They <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="07416" class="">pomegranates</st> of <st data-num="08504" class="">blue</st>, <st data-num="0713" class="">purple</st>, and <st data-num="08438 08411" class="">scarlet yarn</st> and <st data-num="07806" class="">twisted linen</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">around</st> the <st data-num="07757" class="">hem</st> of the <st data-num="04598" class="">robe</st>.

They <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="06472" class="">bells</st> of <st data-num="02889" class="">pure</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">attached</st> the <st data-num="06472" class="">bells</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">between</st> the <st data-num="07416" class="">pomegranates</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">around</st> the <st data-num="07757" class="">hem</st> of the <st data-num="04598" class="">robe</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">between</st> the <st data-num="07416" class="">pomegranates</st>.
There was a bell and a pomegranate, a bell and a pomegranate, all around the hem of the robe, to be used in ministering, just as the Lord had commanded Moses.
They made tunics of fine linen—the work of a weaver, for Aaron and for his sons—

and the <st data-num="04701" class="">turban</st> of <st data-num="08336" class="">fine linen</st>, the <st data-num="06287 04021" class="">headbands</st> of <st data-num="08336" class="">fine linen</st>, and the <st data-num="04370" class="">undergarments</st> of <st data-num="08336">fine</st> <st data-num="07806" class="">twisted</st> <st data-num="0906 08336" class="">linen</st>.
The sash was of fine twisted linen and blue, purple, and scarlet yarn, the work of an embroiderer, just as the Lord had commanded Moses.
They made a plate, the holy diadem, of pure gold and wrote on it an inscription, as on the engravings of a seal, “Holiness to the Lord.”
They attached to it a blue cord to attach it to the turban above, just as the Lord had commanded Moses.
So all the work of the tabernacle, the tent of meeting, was completed, and the Israelites did according to all that the Lord had commanded Moses—they did it exactly so.

They <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st>, the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> its <st data-num="03627" class="">furnishings</st>, <st data-num="07165" class="">clasps</st>, <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st>, <st data-num="01280" class="">bars</st>, <st data-num="05982" class="">posts</st>, and <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st>;

and the <st data-num="04372" class="">coverings</st> of <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st> <st data-num="05785" class="">skins</st> <st data-num="0119" class="">dyed red</st>, the <st data-num="04372" class="">covering</st> of <st data-num="08476" class="">fine</st> <st data-num="05785" class="">leather</st>,<n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="04539" class="">protecting</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="06532" class="">curtain</st>;

the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> of the <st data-num="05715" class="">testimony</st> and its <st data-num="0905" class="">poles</st>, and the <st data-num="03727" class="">atonement lid</st>;

the <st data-num="07979" class="">table</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> its <st data-num="03627" class="">utensils</st>, and the <st data-num="03899" class="">Bread</st> of the <st data-num="06440" class="">Presence</st>;

the <st data-num="02889" class="">pure</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04501" class="">lampstand</st>, its <st data-num="05216" class="">lamps</st>, with the <st data-num="05216" class="">lamps</st> <st data-num="04634" class="">set in order</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> its <st data-num="03627" class="">accessories</st>, and <st data-num="08081" class="">oil</st> for the <st data-num="03974" class="">light</st>;

and the <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st>, and the <st data-num="04888" class="">anointing</st> <st data-num="08081" class="">oil</st>, and the <st data-num="05561" class="">fragrant</st> <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st>; and the <st data-num="04539" class="">curtain</st> for the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> to the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st>;

the <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st> <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> and its <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st> <st data-num="04345" class="">grating</st>, its <st data-num="0905" class="">poles</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> its <st data-num="03627" class="">utensils</st>; the large <st data-num="03595" class="">basin</st> with its <st data-num="03653" class="">pedestal</st>;

the <st data-num="07050" class="">hangings</st> of the <st data-num="02691" class="">courtyard</st>, its <st data-num="05982" class="">posts</st> and its <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st>, and the <st data-num="04539" class="">curtain</st> for the <st data-num="08179" class="">gateway</st> of the <st data-num="02691" class="">courtyard</st>, its <st data-num="04340" class="">ropes</st> and its <st data-num="03489" class="">tent pegs</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03627" class="">furnishings</st><n id="1" /> for the <st data-num="05656" class="">service</st> of the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st>, for the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st>;
the woven garments for serving in the sanctuary, the holy garments for Aaron the priest, and the garments for his sons to minister as priests.
The Israelites did all the work according to all that the Lord had commanded Moses.
Moses inspected all the work, and they had done it just as the Lord had commanded—they had done it exactly—and Moses blessed them.
